    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(Tank tank,
              int bulletIdx,
              float x,
              float y,
              float deg,
              float power,
              int wind,
              int[] color)
        Constructor for a bullet.
        Parameters:
        tank - The tank that shot this bullet.
        bulletIdx - An integer representing the index of this bullet in the array of bullets that the tank has shot.
        x - A float representing the X-coordinate of the bullet.
        y - A float representing the Y-coordinate of the bullet.
        deg - A float representing the degree of the tank's turret.
        power - A float representing the power of the tank.
        wind - An integer representing the value of the wind at the time the bullet is shot.
        color - An integer array containing the color of the bullet.

    • Method Detail

      • setCol

        public static void setCol(Column[] cols)
        Set the terrain of the game.
        Parameters:
        cols - Arrays of columns representing the terrain of the game.

      • calculateDistance

        public static int calculateDistance(int x1,
                                    int x2,
                                    int y1,
                                    int y2)
        Calculate the Euclidean distance between 2 points.
        Parameters:
        x1 - An integer representing the x-coordinate of point 1.
        x2 - An integer representing the x-coordinate of point 2.
        y1 - An integer representing the y-coordinate of point 1.
        y2 - An integer representing the y-coordinate of point 2.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the distance.

      • calculateHeightDiff

        public static int calculateHeightDiff(int diff)
        Calculate how many pixels (terrain) are in the explosion given that a column is diff_x from the explosion's center.
        Parameters:
        diff - An integer representing the distance from the explosion's center.
        Returns:
        An integer representing how many pixels loss.

      • changeHeight

        public static void changeHeight(Column col,
                                int height_origin,
                                int height_diff,
                                Tank t)
        Change the height of a column and reduce tank's health if hit.
        Parameters:
        col - A column within the proximity of the explosion.
        height_origin - An integer representing the y-coordinate of the explosion's center.
        height_diff - An integer representing how many pixels that the column suppose to lose.
        t - The tank that shot the bullet.

      • explode

        public void explode(int x_origin,
                    int y_origin)
        Calculate all the explosion damage.
        Parameters:
        x_origin - An integer representing the x-coordinate of the explosion's center.
        y_origin - An integer representing the y-coordinate of the explosion's center.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Display the bullet on screen.
        Parameters:
        app - The main application to draw on.
